Package com.dotmarketing.viewtools.content

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryMap
    A helper class to provide an object to return to the dotCMS when a content has a binary field
    CheckboxMap
    The class helps get at the values and options of a Checkbox Field belonging to a piece of content.
    ContentMap
    The purpose of this object is to provide an easy way on the frontend of dotCMS to get at fields, categories, permissions and other related things surrounding content.
    ContentTool
    The purpose of this class is to provide a way to easily search and interact with content and dotcms objects surrounding content from the front end of dotCMS.
    FileAssetMap  
    FileMap
    A wrapper to help provide methods on the front-end of Velocity
    MultiSelectMap
    The class helps get at the values and options of a MultiSelect Field belonging to a piece of content.
    PaginatedContentList<E>  
    RadioMap
    The class helps get at the values and options of a Select Field belonging to a piece of content.
    SelectMap
    The class helps get at the values and options of a Select Field belonging to a piece of content.
    TagList
    Used as a wrapper around an ArrayList of Tags to return to the front-end of dotCMS from the ContentTool.
